message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you at $100. That's the most I'm willing to pay for the product.
